phrases.phrase: 박물관은 지역의 역사에 대해 많은 것을 배울 수 있는 좋은 장소입니다.
meanings: 박물관 · 기념관 Museums are a great place to learn about the history of a region.
(지식·기술 등을) learn, (공부하다) study, (수업을 받다) take[have] lessons (in/on)

meanings.meaning: You can't teach an old dog new tricks.

vlive.korean: [서광고에서 이거 다 배울 수 있어요~] [You can learn all this at Seoul Tourism High School~] View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : [커먼스쿨]서울관광고등학교 ep7(홍현희X정세운X강율)
vlive.english: [You can learn all this at Seoul Tourism High School~]

vlive.korean: "한국어 잘 배울 수 있는 팁 있나요?" "Can you give tips for learning Korean??" 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : I.M
vlive.english: "Can you give tips for learning Korean??"

vlive.korean: '악기 하나 더 배울 수 있으면...?' If I could learn another instrument, what would I learn? 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : DJ Jacob 🎸🎶
vlive.english: If I could learn another instrument, what would I learn?

vlive.korean: 이 현대 음악... 그러니까 대중 음악을 배울 수 있는? Modern music? Where you can learn about popular music? 듣기 View video SF9 : 두데
vlive.english: Modern music? Where you can learn about popular music?

vlive.korean: [010] 지금 딱 한 가지만 배울 수 있다면 배워보고 싶은 것은? [010] If you can learn just one thing now, what do you want to learn? 듣기 View video AB6IX : AB6IX (에이비식스) 100 DAYS❗ - DONG HYUN
vlive.english: [010] If you can learn just one thing now, what do you want to learn?

examples.korean: You could learn the basics in, let’s say, three months. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 기본 사항들은 아마 석 달쯤이면 배울 수 있을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You could learn the basics in, let’s say, three months. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You can learn a great deal just from watching other players. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 다른 선수들을 지켜보는 것만으로도 많은 것을 배울 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can learn a great deal just from watching other players. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The site gives neophytes the chance to learn from experts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사이트는 초보자들에게 전문가들로부터 배울 수 있는 기회를 제공한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The site gives neophytes the chance to learn from experts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Older workers can be as adaptable and quick to learn as anyone else. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나이 많은 근로자들도 다른 누구 못지않게 적응도 하고 빨리 배울 수도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Older workers can be as adaptable and quick to learn as anyone else. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: One is never too old to learn. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 배울수 없을 정도로 늙은 사람은 없다. (영국속담, 공부속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: One is never too old to learn. Add to Wordbook
